This is a Live Game! How to Play:
It's simple! When the host starts the game you will be presented with 20 multiple choice questions. You'll only have a few seconds to answer before the timer runs out so answer quickly! Be careful - all answers are final. You'll compete in groups of 4 and whoever scores the highest in your group wins!
